name: Imperial Ghoul
description: The Imperial Ghoul is a Medium-sized undead creature that embodies the essence of evil and decay, characterized by its disciplined and strategical nature in combat.
memorable: It can infect humanoids with a debilitating disease and paralyze targets with its claw attack.
goals: To ambush and infect targets, while remaining resilient against divine threats.
relations: Often found alongside other ghouls and undead creatures.
environment: Typically lurking in tombs or decaying ruins.
strengths: Immunity to poison and conditions such as being charmed, exhausted, or poisoned.
attacks: The ghoul can bite to inflict piercing damage and potentially infect, while its claw attack causes slashing damage and can paralyze foes.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to paralyze non-elf and non-undead targets with its claw attack.
equipment: Light Crossbow used for ranged attacks.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 60 feet, allowing it to see in dim light.
additional_information: Requires no air or sleep, granting exceptional endurance.
Advantage on saving throws against effects that turn undead.
Good strength score makes it effective in melee combat.
Strategical and disciplined in combat situations.
Potential to inflict darakhul fever disease.
